name: Falling for Beans
description:
Experience the tale of Jack and the Beanstalk like never before! Control Jack as you attempt to climb down the Beanstalk while being chased by the mighty Giant. Strategically fall between the vines of the stalk and a variety of leaves, all of which have special attributes that both hinder and assist in your decent. Don't fret if you don't make it on your first go, collecting beans while descending both tops off your health and allows you to buy upgrades for future attempts!

Do you think you can survive falling down the mighty Beanstalk?
